Test Name: Genetic Analysis (DNA Extraction, PCR Amplification, and Sequencing)
Specimen Type: Extracted DNA from patient genetic specimens
Purpose: To generate accurate and reproducible genetic test results by extracting, quantifying, amplifying, sequencing, and analyzing DNA to identify genetic variations.
Container: Microcentrifuge tube (for extracted DNA) and PCR tubes/plates for amplification
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, NanoDrop or Qubit fluorometer, PCR thermocycler, DNA sequencer, LIMS with bioinformatics software
